website_summaries.verdict: A thorough three-stage filter (including HEPA filtration) for the car - just plug into your cigarette lighter.
pros: Also works as an essential oil diffuser
Users say it's effective against cigarette odors
cons: It's on the large side, and it sits on the dashboard
If you're a petite driver, it could impede your view

customer_reviews.title: Extemely well made but needs more power.
customer_reviews.text: What I like: Can leave on in car all day at work running. Low sound. Beautifully built. Packaging was Iphone level quality. Improvement: Adjustable power. I would like to have a high flow setting I can use while the car is running. More vent holes. Summary: For high pollution areas this filter is not enough if that is what you are looking for. For the price this is extremely well made. Its almost like a piece of art. I would like to be able to increase the pull of the fans. I'd be willing to pay more for this. The filter is massive and could handle much more air flow. This is a very low key passive filter.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy this
customer_reviews.text: This filter works very well. Please note a bunch of the 1 star reviews appear fake. Not verified purchasers, and if you look into their profiles they gave another competing product a 5 star review.. and those are the ONLY reviews on the accounts. Anywho.. I wish there was an option to disable the LED lights. Queenty- please look into this as an option. And we need replacement filters for sale. This works well for vehicles or behind an entertainment system setup - game consoles, receiver, etc. It moves some serious air.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good for removing smoke smell
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our daughter a Nissan Ultima that unfortunately had been smoked in. We only noticed after we purchased and the car was a really good deal with low miles. Hard to pass up, but I suffer from migraines by just the slight smell of cigarette smoke. I decided to give this a shot because ewe who wants to smell cigs smoke if you don't smoke. After the easy set up we added a lemon essential oil and BAM. After a few days the smell was gone and there was a nice clean smelling car!
customer_reviews.author: MikeSmith

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT for a smoker
customer_reviews.text: Well now. One of the biggest fights I've had this winter is keeping my SUV from smelling like smoke when I've had to smoke in my car because of how ridiculously cold this winter has been. Even cleaning the fabric and freezing often still left a lingering scent of nicotine. Read the reviews on this and had hopes it would help. Oh yeah. Definitely made a difference after a day, and a week later I don't notice any smokey scent at all unless I really shove my nose in the fabric. Sound level is quiet, slightly louder than I expected, but excellent for a vehicle space. Worth every penny to me.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Useful Gadget
customer_reviews.text: Solar radiation management particulate, engineered pathogens, fossil fuel wasteproduct, and good old fashioned air crud can team up and do a number of sensitive alveoli. This filter does an excellent job of clearing out small areas (a room in a house) for personal breathing safety. What I find most interesting is the subtle noise made by the vacuum effect, remarkably similar to the sound made by an 8hz binaural I use to meditate. Is it a stable field emitter? Possibly, it certainly seems to produce subsonic vibrations that harmonically stack into a stable background note. I don't know for sure, but I'd wager that this technology could be used to counteract dissonant microwave fields.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Spikowski

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for use in my oil vacuum truck. While in operation the truck produces oil vapor that condenses in the cab, I'm not in the cab breathing it, but it gets on everything. Having used this device for a couple of weeks now, I can say it works for removing oil vapor/smoke/smell effectively. I may wind up going through filters fast though as my original one is getting dark fast, but it's working harder than its intended use. Side note, I've forgotten to unplug it a couple of times and it was on overnight and the truck started fine, but it also has two batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Edgydrifter

customer_reviews.title: Effective.
customer_reviews.text: My car had lower manifold gasket issues so the cabin would smell like burnt oil at red lights. This worked really well to keep the air quality good. No smell! Update: Had for several months and now the fans pop out easily. Last week a fan popped out and while I was spinning on my dash one of the fan pieces snapped off and now it rattles very loudly when in use. Wish there were better products on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great and works
customer_reviews.text: A big different after use. Almost a week now. My car smell purifier than before. I used to smoke. There are smoking scent and after a week all the smoking smell gone. Just a little big on the dashboard that’s all
customer_reviews.author: AMY C.

customer_reviews.title: plug broke after using a few times.
customer_reviews.text: worst thing I have ever bought . Factory does not respond to warranty requests and asurion impossible to use the site . $5 CAR PLUg needed and even an amazon customer service agent on the hine with both of them could not help. Not able to even get it to down load correctly and factory still has a warranty but refuses to even answer e mails . The damned thing was $59 and not even worth $5 .Asurion insurance is also not to be trusted as they use their customer service time to make sure clients cannot get thru . AMAZON is not to bme but they shoud not allow this company to sell on their .site
customer_reviews.author: daliya robson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am a smoker and I had just bought a car... it was starting to smell like smoke I decided to buy this. The smoke smell is gone within 2 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Dorcie Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Great until a fan permanently falls off
customer_reviews.text: Queenty, would there be a suggested method to affix either fan once it comes off? There is no way to keep it on, so if operating and it comes loose (which it has multiple times), then because the fan is still going, it flings towards a direction and has cut fingers - not cut off, but cut. I would like to fix it and continue using it as the dust build up on the front dashboard has been noticeably lower with this device. I just wonder if I won't be able to change the filter easily if I affix this one side's fan with gorilla glue/tape.
customer_reviews.author: Claire E

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the car!
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for someone who spends time in their car. The simple design fits nicely in any car. It is also quiet so it won’t be distracting to the driver. With clean air so important, this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Matt K

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: this little thing works Great! Not only works great in my car, but put it in my bedroom at night! Love the blue light and it really moves air. One of my favorite Amazon purchases!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie & Jessey

customer_reviews.title: Not much help for smokers
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived broken and they were very good at replacing it. The second one just doesn’t seem to do anything at all. This might work in a car where people don’t smoke but for smokers it appears to be useless. Another 35 bucks in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Emma B.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback on the purifier is that i need to keep my defroster on in the car or the windows fog up. I believe this issue will stop when the warmer weather comes. As to how well it works - my husband does not cough or have trouble breathing anymore. It's terrific!
customer_reviews.author: sapphire nc

customer_reviews.title: Great device... for a month
customer_reviews.text: It slowly started to come apart after a month. Now it makes strange noises as soon as it’s turned on, followed by one or both of the little fans shooting out from the side(s)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mwamba

customer_reviews.title: Minimal low level noise
customer_reviews.text: Quiet. I used it in my Jeep (Hard top model)to help control dust levels when off-roading as my wife has respiratory issues. Have not used it long term yet so will need to evaluate over time.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality was very well constructed. I'm using it on a work truck. For now, I don't seem to feel the effects. I'll update more next time
customer_reviews.author: Jtel87

customer_reviews.title: air filter
customer_reviews.text: Wish the air came out more forcefully. Eliminates odors its ok at best.
customer_reviews.author: rpcomm

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My Dad’s a heavy smoker and his car smelled Really Awful! This purifier worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's no use
customer_reviews.text: It's not easy to use, it doesn't work, and both ends are often open
customer_reviews.author: Xiaofeng zhang

customer_reviews.title: Clean and fresh air
customer_reviews.text: Seems to help my allergies alot. Easy and small enough to use anywhere. I am so glad. I bought this
customer_reviews.author: Wendy F

customer_reviews.title: There is no Carbon Filter
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the pictures and the HEPA filter looks great and it has a prefilter to capture larger particles. Problem is I was distinctively looking for a car filter that has a Carbon Filter to capture CO2 and while they advertise that it includes a Carbon Filter, it in fact does not. A Carbon filter is essentially a additional filter layer of small charcoal pieces. It’s no where to be found.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed al-Adeeb

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it’s a cheap product for its high price.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this product three weeks ago for my car. And the motors for the fans burned out it doesn’t work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan L Tackett

customer_reviews.title: very little air flow if any
customer_reviews.text: It's junk, moves about as much air as a cricket farting would work great if you wanted to freshen the box your tennis shoes came in and you had a couple of days to do it. Returning
customer_reviews.author: A. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Dont let it stay in hot car
customer_reviews.text: Tube already cracked due to heat , no warranty, like the filtering though.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you from smelling like smoke in the car.
customer_reviews.text: This HEPA filter is beyond amazing! I drive 12 hours to and from work several times a month, and I chain-smoke the entire way. Normally when I arrive I smell like the bottom of a dirty old ashtray. I just made the drive using this HEPA filter, and I don’t smell like smoke even a tiny bit. My hair which is usually just wreaking of smoke still smells like my shampoo. I am so impressed. I didn’t really think it was going to work.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for my small art studio. It works as expected. The quality seems good that should last for a long time. I also used it in my car during our trips, and we noticed it does reduce the smells in my car.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for those with allergies
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recently took up horseback riding and I am terribly allergic. Driving her home dirty from the barn, both she and her saddle covered in horse hair, was killing me! I put this filter in my car and I haven’t had an allergic reaction since. It’s a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Jpel

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky.
customer_reviews.text: Update: I’m updating to 3 stars based solely on customer service. They reached out and offered a refund for the defective item. I wish I could say this works great...but it made so much squeaking noise bouncing up and down that I couldn’t continue using it. The squeaking is from the design and the plastic casing making noise. I went with another filter with a simpler design. No squeaking sound. Don’t know if anyone else had issues, but the noise was so irritating I had to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Calla Lily 212

customer_reviews.title: Imma Fan
customer_reviews.text: Air duct cleaner here, filters nice. I have lots of car odors and dust that I don’t like bringing home/breathing. Sometimes I leave on overnight and car air IS clean not SMELLS clean. Over enough time clean air will penetrate soft surfaces of car. Worth money and I hope they come out with more high powered one.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Draz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my Rig but I'm not sure it does much more than the cabin filter. Does circulate air mildly and not intrusive with space or sound.
customer_reviews.author: kbjld

customer_reviews.title: Smell killer
customer_reviews.text: It’s very simple and effective product. I drive limousine for living. With this purifier I stop using air freshener in my car. This make your car air fresh and without any smell. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Hassan butt

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The one I got was not properly sealed and didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: nanaky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband. He installed it in his car. It is easy to install and use. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice one
customer_reviews.text: I took a night picture to see it more beautiful at night, but the flash ruined it. lol Anyway, this is a great air purifier, small enough to have it in your car, big enough to purify the air inside the car. How it works basically just 2 fans in the head, and a filter in the middle. The fans suck the air from the middle and release it to the heads. It has blue light, which is very cool! I like it so far
customer_reviews.author: Kris Dang

customer_reviews.title: Smoking not a problem anymore
customer_reviews.text: Its really effective. I’ve been using in my car for two weeks, today I take it to my room and I decide buy another one for my room too. I rarely smoke and this product is exactly for me. It can entirely clean air in couple of minutes after you smoke.
customer_reviews.author: ufukguner

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: Works great for inside my tractor trailer cab. I do a lot of off road driving and I can really tell a difference in the way the air feels and the amount of dust on my dash from before I got this filter.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Clark

customer_reviews.title: Moves alot of air
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 speed is a little loud. About the same as number 2 setting on your air conditioner
customer_reviews.author: Mike A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Piece of JUNK
customer_reviews.text: My step dad bought this and it stopped working after about a week or so. It’s not much of a surprise considering it barely made a difference to the air quality inside his old pickup truck to begin with. There isn’t much variety for installation so you’re stuck having the piece of junk mounted on your dashboard. There are much better alternatives out there, stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Caddick

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality product doesnt work wouldn’t recommend it worked for one day and just stopped working
customer_reviews.author: sevana

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap product! Dislike it! Would never buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: garrett wedemire

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: My friend got me this and it really lacks quality. It makes a weird noise and makes the air smell bad.
customer_reviews.author: Catholic Connect

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective, like at all
customer_reviews.text: I installed the filter hoping it would at least be able to get rid of lingering smells or all the dust suspended in my car. I am saddened to announce that it didn’t make any difference in my car. Bad purchase on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Kan Singh

customer_reviews.title: WASTE
customer_reviews.text: Broke down after 3 days. Not worth the money . Didnt do anything for the purification for inside my car
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: It could look big on your car... it works
customer_reviews.text: I bough this because I drive a lot with my dog and she sheds so my car is full of hair sometimes. It’s easy to use, it works just by plugging it to the USB port, it’s not really that loud but you could hear it. Too big if you’re concern about style but the filter looks good, however you barely see any hair inside of the filter, but this happens with my other house filters so I don’t really know if the fact that you don’t see many hairs inside of the filter means that it’s working or not. It light’s up blue so thats cool and it’s really not heavy nor delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: a little loud but effective
customer_reviews.text: The device is a very loud so I have to turn my volume on my radio to drown out the sound. it is also obnoxiously large. With that being said it is extremely effective with cutting down the odor post workouts and I have not sneezed at all since adjusting it. For reference my car gets dusty and hits my allergies hard! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JC2

customer_reviews.title: The biggest air purifier i've seen for a car
customer_reviews.text: The fans push a decent amount of air for two 5 volt fans. given the size of the air purifier and the air it pushes I'd say its the best car purifier to buy. I'm actually considering a inverter adapter to put one in my bathroom given the size and price.
customer_reviews.author: cyc1on

customer_reviews.title: Place it right
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my small car. My only problem is that you need to place the purifier *exactly right* or it may slide a bit. This also may vary with your specific car - my dashboard is a bit lumpy
customer_reviews.author: Gnome

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Company says it has an ionizer but it does not have one.
customer_reviews.author: Candy malaspina

product_meta.title: QUEENTY HEPA Car Air Purifier, High Efficiency Carbon Filter, Eliminates Smoke, Dust, Pollen and Bad Odors for Auto and Small Space with Car Charger
product_meta.description:
Fresh Air Along with Your Car Trip, QUEENTY air cleaner is designed to put in the front of your car. The small air purifier can not only fresh the air but also decorate the car front, suitable for 99% cars and other small space such as studio, bedroom, office desktop, kitchen, pet room, etc.

Car Air Purifier
Size: Width 220mm x Length 90mm x Height 95mm
Weight: 800g
Material: PMMA, stainless steel, natural rubber, hyper fiberglass, activated carbon
Input: DC 5V 1A
Max Power: 5W
Filter: Pre-filter, HEPA filter, Carbon filter
Clean Air Delivery Rate（CADR）: Dust (50), Powder (50)
Noise Level: 45 - 55dB
USB Cable Length: 1.2m / 47.2 inches
Cubic feet per minute (CFM): 120

USB Car Charger
Size: 2.8 x 2.8 x 16.9mm(L*W*H)
Weight: 25g
Port: 2 USB Ports for charging your mobile phone while using the car purifier
Input: DC 12V/24V
Output: DC 5V 2.4A, 12W
Input Plug Type: Standard Car Charger Cigarette Butts
Output Wire and Interface type: USB

Package Content
1 X Car air purifier & HEPA filter(with USB cable connected)
1 X Car charger
1 X User Manual

Warm tips
1. The filter can work 6 months on average in general environment. It may need to be replaced sooner or later depending on the air quality in area.
2. If you want more fragrant air, you can add drops of essential oil to the filter.
3. You can find the replacement filter in our shop,ASIN: B081KSM2RM
feature_bullets: 【Car Air Purifier with True HEPA Filter】3 stage filtration system, pre-filter, true HEPA filter & activated carbon filter. It removes 99.97 Percent of dust, pollen, smoke, odor and pet dander; filters particles as small as 0.3 microns and larger and filters air pollution of PM 2.5. Replacement Filter Available, ASIN: B081KSM2RM

【Portable Air Freshener for Auto】Comes with a crystal and elegant body , dual fans in the air outlet and stainless steel base, the small air purifier does not block your sight. Stand steadily in your car even in a high speed 220km/h or a sudden brake. The anti-slip rubber mats can prevent your car from being damaged by friction.

【Powerful Functions and Easy Installation】It works automatically once connected with the cigarette lighter, DC 5V, 1A, saving power, dual ports car charger DC 12-24V, compatible for 99% cars. Noise lower than 55db. The replacement filter can be easily set up in seconds.

【Special Features and Contemporary Design】The 8 LED indicator lights will be continuously on when the purifier is connected. Essential oil (not included) can be added to the filter to be a car oil diffuser. Creating a fresh and romantic aromatherapy environment, no ozone and no UV-C light. Get it and let it be a warm-hearted friend for your trip.

【Professional After-sales Team with 100% Full Satisfaction】Package includes 1 X car air purifier & HEPA filter (with USB cable conneted), 1 X car charger, 1 X user manual. We provide 30 days money back and 24 hours online customer service. If you have any problems, please contact us via Amazon email. We will try our best to meet your satisfaction.
